value.title: Former VP Pence narrates 'The Age of Rush', a look at the man behind the golden microphone
value.excerpt: How did Rush Limbaugh, a shy college dropout, become the most powerful radio talk show host of all time? A new FOX Nation special, "The Age of Rush" examines the late conservative icon's life and legacy.

value.title: WSJ Opinion: Mike Pence Goes From Hero to Villain

value.title: Pence will make his first speech since leaving office.
value.excerpt: The former vice president left Washington on the outs with former President Donald J. Trump, and his speech next month will be scrutinized for hints of his political future.

value.title: Pence to deliver first post-VP speech in South Carolina as he eyes political future
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence will head to South Carolina next month to deliver his first public address since the end of the Trump administration.

value.title: Mike Pence breaks silence in op-ed slamming House Dems’ voting reform bill
value.excerpt: Pence made his feelings known in an op-ed published Wednesday by The Daily Signal, a blog run by the conservative Heritage Foundation, where the former VP is a fellow.

value.title: Fact check: Pence echoes Trump's Big Lie in dishonest op-ed on election rules
value.excerpt: In an opinion article published on Wednesday, former Vice President Mike Pence did something he used to do in office: echo a lie from former President Donald Trump in a slightly more sophisticated way.

value.title: 'Highly misleading at best': Dale reacts to Pence's op-ed
value.excerpt: CNN's Daniel Dale fact-checks claims former Vice President Mike Pence made in an op-ed, where he alleges that there were "voting irregularities" that took place during the 2020 US election.

value.title: Pence rails against HR 1, laments Capitol riot prevented 'substantive discussion' on election integrity
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence offered harsh criticism for a Democrat-proposed voting reform legislation while condemning the Capitol protest on Jan. 6 that, he said, interrupted what would have been a worthwhile discussion of election integrity.

value.title: Mike Pence’s remarkable op-ed highlights the GOP’s choice on voting rights — and where it will probably land
value.excerpt: Alleged voting problems in 2020. In an op-ed for the Daily Signal, Pence details his opposition to a voting rights bill spearheaded by House Democrats. value.title: Pence breaks silence to criticize 2020 elections
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence on Wednesday criticized the 2020 elections in his his first extended written comments since leaving office in January.

value.title: Pence pushes false election fraud claims in denouncing Democratic reform bill
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence is seizing on a Democratic-led initiative to streamline election standards to again push false claims of voting irregularities in one of his first public statements since leaving office.

value.title: Mike Pence Calls Proposed Election Reform Bill 'Reckless' and 'Anti-Democratic' in Op-Ed
value.excerpt: The former vice president said H.R. 1, also known as For the People Act, was "a brazen attempt to nationalize elections in blatant disregard of the U.S. Constitution."

value.title: Mike Pence Lags Well Behind Key GOP Contenders for a 2024 Presidential Run in CPAC Poll
value.excerpt: Only 1 percent of CPAC attendees surveyed said they would vote for Pence if the GOP primary for president were held today.

value.title: Power Up: Pence seeks to chart his own political future – as establishment Republican fluent in MAGA
value.excerpt: All that's missing from former vice president Mike Pence's political reemergence after surviving an insurrection and the turbulent Trump White House is a book deal. value.title: Pence and Trump's relationship is 'amicable,' source says
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence and former President Donald Trump have spoken twice since the inauguration last month, according to a knowledgeable source, who described the pair's relationship as "amicable."

value.title: Pence declined CPAC invitation: source
value.excerpt: Former Vice President Mike Pence has declined an invitation to attend this year's Conservative Political Action Conference, Fox News has learned.

value.title: UCLA student charged over Capitol riot after sitting in Mike Pence’s chair
value.excerpt: A white-nationalist Californian student filmed sitting in the Senate chair that then-Vice President Mike Pence had just fled during the Capitol riot has been charged, according to an FBI

value.title: Mike Pence on Rush Limbaugh's impact: 'America lost a giant today'
value.excerpt: Well, we're mournful because we lost a giant today, a great and unparalleled radio icon, of course, Rush Limbaugh. But we're also grateful for having heard his voice and wisdom for as long as we did.

value.title: UCLA Student Charged in Capitol Riot; Allegedly Sat in Mike Pence's Chair
value.excerpt: A UCLA student from Costa Mesa who founded a campus political organization is facing federal charges of participating in the insurrection at the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6, officials said Wednesday. Christian Secor,
